changelog.news: IG is currently disabling recent/top feed due to election misinformation. Go to settings > advanced settings > and turn on Feed Correction to skip feed selection to reduce navigation errors. User reported Google Pixel 2XL works.
bugfixes: sanitize inputs amount to prevent crashes
